i need help getting nvidia-glx-new and libc-dev on my fresh gutsy load
anyone else have trouble getting their nvidia card working on ubuntu 7.10?
i need help getting nvidia-glx-new and libc-dev on my fresh gutsy load
use the Restricted Drivers Manager to install the nvidia driver, under the menu
it fails and says it cant load nvidia-glx-new
what kind of nvidia card do you have?
it says, nvidia-glx-new is not in use
do you have all your repos enabled?
enable the universe and multiverse repos
thank you, ill get back to u in a moment
thanks alot, seems to be loading fine
